3: All systems green. This CPF can be reactivated immediately.
Tied to the same circuit as the great theater, the CPF rebooting sequence causes a temporary short in the theater control systems.
And so, to ensure the safety of the stage equipment, every combustible item automatically triggers to clear out the blanks inside.
On the stage, on the other hand—
Glittering shards and colorful ribbons shower the stage, closing out the finale. It could be mistaken as the celebration of a generational talent, a world-renowned performer.
Even Bunshiro, alone on the stage, seems to hear the ringing and roaring of cheers and applause from the empty rows, washing over him like a wave.
It may just be an insignificant bug in the Thespioid's code: to bow to an empty hall, and wave to vacant seats...
...but as a small reward to a born performer, finally allowed to bow out, it's not so bad.
